creator: grtodd@netscape.net
text:
After installing tomcat-4.0.1 rpm from:

http://jakarta.apache.org/builds/jakarta-tomcat-4.0/release/v4.0.1/rpms/

much (most?) of the documentation on localhost is not available.

ls -Ral /var/tomcat4/webapps/tomcat-docs/   reveals many zero length files. 

To reproduce
=============

Visit
http://localhost:8180/tomcat-docs/index.html

click on Documentation

Results
========
A blank document with source <html><body></body></html> appears

Expected result
================
Documentation heirarchy appears.

Fix
====
Download documentation from jakarta.apache.org and replace zerolength files. The
RPM and/or src.rpm build process is likely broken somewhere and should be fixed.
It also appears that several of the image filse have been corrupted.
creator: weshay@telocity.com
